Class Player

java.lang.Object
objects.GameObject
objects.Player
public class Player extends GameObject

  • Field Summary

    color, height, sprite, width, x, y

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    checkHit(ResourceSystem resourceSystem, double currentAngle)
    Checks for hit collisions with resources based on current angle Precondition: resourceSystem is a valid ResourceSystem, currentAngle is the angle of the player's tool swing Postcondition: if a resource is hit, appropriate action is taken
    void
    draw(Graphics2D g2d)
    Draws the player at its current position without rotation Precondition: g2d is a valid Graphics2D object Postcondition: player is drawn on screen at its (x, y) position
    void
    drawAt(Graphics2D g2d, int screenX, int screenY, int mouseX, int mouseY)
    Draws the player at specified screen coordinates, rotated to face mouse position Precondition: g2d is a valid Graphics2D object, screenX/Y are the top-left screen coordinates to draw the player, mouseX/Y are the current mouse coordinates Postcondition: player is drawn on screen facing mouse position
    void
    drawProjectiles(Graphics2D g2d)
    Draws the player's projectiles Precondition: g2d is a valid Graphics2D object Postcondition: projectiles are drawn on screen
    void
    fillShield()
    Fills the player's shield health to maximum based on equipped armor Precondition: N/A Postcondition: shieldHealth is set to maximum shield health
    Rectangle
    getBounds()
    Gets the bounding rectangle of the player for collision detection Precondition: N/A Postcondition: A Rectangle object representing the player's bounds is returned

    Gets the center X coordinate of the player Precondition: N/A Postcondition: returns center X coordinate

    Gets the maximum shield health provided by equipped armor Precondition: N/A Postcondition: returns max shield health

    getProjectiles()
    Gets the list of projectiles fired by the player Precondition: N/A Postcondition: returns list of active projectiles

    getShieldHealth()
    Gets the current shield health of the player Precondition: N/A Postcondition: returns current shield health
    Rectangle
    getToolBounds()
    Gets the bounding rectangle of the player's active tool for hit detection Precondition: N/A Postcondition: returns Rectangle of active tool's hitbox if swinging, else null

    getToolDamage()
    Gets the damage of the player's active tool Precondition: N/A Postcondition: returns damage value of active tool, or 0 if no tool equipped

    Gets the width of the player Precondition: N/A Postcondition: returns width
    boolean
    isDead()
    Checks if the player is dead Precondition: N/A Postcondition: returns true if current health is 0 or less
    void
    move(boolean up, boolean down, boolean left, boolean right, int minX, int maxX, int minY, int maxY, ResourceSystem resourceSystem, BuildingSystem buildingSystem)
    Moves the player based on input directions and world bounds Precondition: up, down, left, right indicate movement directions; minX, maxX, minY, maxY define movement bounds; resourceSystem is valid for collision detection; buildingSystem is valid for collision detection Postcondition: player position is updated within bounds
    void
    reset(double x, double y)
    Resets the player's position and health Precondition: N/A Postcondition: Player's position is set to (x, y) and health is restored
    void
    setMouseHolding(boolean holding)
    Sets whether the mouse button is being held down for swinging Precondition: N/A Postcondition: isMouseHolding is set to holding, spaceToggle is disabled if holding
    void
    takeDamage(int amount)
    Reduces the player's health by the specified amount Precondition: amount is non-negative Postcondition: currentHealth is decreased by amount, not below 0
    void
    toggleSpaceSwing()
    Toggles the swing action for the player Precondition: N/A Postcondition: isSwinging is toggled and swingTimer is reset if stopping
    void
    update()
    Updates the player's state Precondition: N/A Postcondition: player's shield regenerates and projectiles are updated
    void
    updateSwing(ResourceSystem resourceSystem)
    Updates the player's swing animation and processes hits Precondition: N/A Postcondition: swing animation is updated, cooldowns are applied, and hits are processed
    void
    usePotion()
    Uses a health potion if available to restore health and shield Precondition: N/A Postcondition: currentHealth is restored to MAX_HEALTH and shieldHealth is filled if potion is used

    • move

      public void move(boolean up, boolean down, boolean left, boolean right, int minX, int maxX, int minY, int maxY, ResourceSystem resourceSystem, BuildingSystem buildingSystem)
      Moves the player based on input directions and world bounds Precondition: up, down, left, right indicate movement directions; minX, maxX, minY, maxY define movement bounds; resourceSystem is valid for collision detection; buildingSystem is valid for collision detection Postcondition: player position is updated within bounds
      Parameters:
      up - whether the player is moving up
      down - whether the player is moving down
      left - whether the player is moving left
      right - whether the player is moving right
      minX - the minimum x-coordinate the player can move to
      maxX - the maximum x-coordinate the player can move to
      minY - the minimum y-coordinate the player can move to
      maxY - the maximum y-coordinate the player can move to
      resourceSystem - the ResourceSystem for collision detection
      buildingSystem - the BuildingSystem for collision detection

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int amount)
      Reduces the player's health by the specified amount Precondition: amount is non-negative Postcondition: currentHealth is decreased by amount, not below 0
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of damage to take

    • usePotion

      public void usePotion()
      Uses a health potion if available to restore health and shield Precondition: N/A Postcondition: currentHealth is restored to MAX_HEALTH and shieldHealth is filled if potion is used

      Updates the player's swing animation and processes hits Precondition: N/A Postcondition: swing animation is updated, cooldowns are applied, and hits are processed
      Parameters:
      resourceSystem - the ResourceSystem for hit detection on trees and stones

    • drawProjectiles

      public void drawProjectiles(Graphics2D g2d)

      Parameters:

    • checkHit

      public void checkHit(ResourceSystem resourceSystem, double currentAngle)
      Checks for hit collisions with resources based on current angle Precondition: resourceSystem is a valid ResourceSystem, currentAngle is the angle of the player's tool swing Postcondition: if a resource is hit, appropriate action is taken
      Parameters:
      resourceSystem - the ResourceSystem for hit detection
      currentAngle - the angle of the player's tool swing

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the player's state Precondition: N/A Postcondition: player's shield regenerates and projectiles are updated
      Specified by:
      update in class GameObject

    • drawAt

      public void drawAt(Graphics2D g2d, int screenX, int screenY, int mouseX, int mouseY)
      Draws the player at specified screen coordinates, rotated to face mouse position Precondition: g2d is a valid Graphics2D object, screenX/Y are the top-left screen coordinates to draw the player, mouseX/Y are the current mouse coordinates Postcondition: player is drawn on screen facing mouse position
      Parameters:
      g2d - the Graphics2D object to draw on
      screenX - the x-coordinate on the screen to draw the player
      screenY - the y-coordinate on the screen to draw the player
      mouseX - the current x-coordinate of the mouse
      mouseY - the current y-coordinate of the mouse

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2d)
